name: awning
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a cloth or plastic cover fastened to a building or structure and supported by a frame that is used to protect someone or something from the sun or rain: The gaily striped awnings of the market stalls made an attractive scene. See also
sunblind Australian English
AdrianHancu/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
